text: The 2005-06 season was the first season after Red Bull took over SV Austria Salzburg. The denial of the club's history, the renaming and the abandonment of the purple club colors amounted to an erasure of the traditional club and caused dissatisfaction from fans and a media response in Europe. After the end of the season coach Jara was fired due to possible speculation regarding player transfers. Giovanni Trapattoni (team boss) and Lothar Matthäus (coach) were hired as successors. ==Squad== * Goalkeepers:1 Alexander Manninger, 22 Heinz Arzberger , 23 Pascal Grünwald * Defenders: 3 Laszlo Bodnar, 25 Ronald Gercaliu, 2 Christoph Jank, 15 Aleksander Knavs 4 Thomas Linke, 14 Alexander Pöllhuber, 6 Alexander von Schwedler,33 Thomas Winklhofer * Midfielders: 28 René Aufhauser 5 Ezequiel Alejo Carboni 10 Andreas Ivanschitz 11 Patrik Jezek 8 Roland Kirchler 17 Jürgen Pichorner 20 Markus Scharrer 18 Markus Schopp 12 Maynor Suazo * Forwards: 21 Marc Janko 9 Vratislav Lokvenc 16 Wolfgang Mair 19 Christian Mayrleb 7 Alexander Zickler * Coach:Kurt Jara Goalkeeper-coach: Herbert Ilsanker === Final table=== Team M W D L Goals +/- Points 1\.
